tour.welcome_content: Welcome to your mission control. This quick tour will show you how to manage, monitor, and configure your server.
tour.header_content: Use this top bar to quickly switch between your Dashboard, Credit Pools, Billing, and Account Settings at any time.
tour.status_content: This badge shows the real-time state of your server (Running, Stopped, or Working). It updates automatically.
tour.controls_content: Use these buttons to Start, Stop, or Restart your server. Use 'Kill' only if the server is unresponsive.
tour.address_content: Click this box to instantly copy the server IP address to your clipboard.
tour.resources_content: Monitor CPU and RAM usage in real-time. If usage is high, consider upgrading your RAM allocation.
tour.tabs_content: This navigation bar gives you access to advanced tools. Let's look at the most important ones.
tour.console_content: The direct line to your server. Watch startup logs live, debug errors, and execute admin commands (like /op or /gamemode).
tour.files_content: Full access to your server files. Upload plugins, edit configuration files directly in the browser, or manage data.
tour.software_content: Switch between Vanilla, Paper, or Forge. You can also browse and install popular Modpacks with a single click.
tour.world_content: Manage your save files. Upload a custom map .zip, download your current progress, or generate a fresh world seed.
tour.players_content: Control access to your server. Whitelist friends, manage Operators (OPs), and view or revoke bans.
tour.schedules_content: Set it and forget it. Schedule automatic daily restarts, backups, or recurring server messages.
tour.properties_content: Configure core settings (Difficulty, PvP, Max Players) using simple toggles instead of editing files manually.
tour.mods_content: Search and install individual mods or plugins to enhance your gameplay experience.
tour.backups_content: Create snapshots of your server. If something breaks, you can restore your server to a previous point in time.
tour.access_content: Share this server with friends. Grant them permission to start the server, view the console, or manage files.
tour.billing_content: Track your hourly cost and estimated runtime. If your balance runs low, you can add credits here.

resources.title: Live Resources
resources.server_offline: Server is offline. Start it to view metrics.

billing.title: Billing Status
billing.warning_low: Warning: Low balance. Server may stop soon.
billing.pool_explanation: If the pool runs out of credits, the server will attempt to charge your personal wallet.

errors.stop_ram: Server must be stopped to change RAM.
errors.ram_range: RAM must be between 2 and 32 GB.

notifications.ready_body: Your server "{{serverName}}" has finished starting up and is now Running.

input.placeholder: Type a command (e.g. /op user, /time set day)...
input.disconnected: * Console is disconnected. Start the server to issue commands.

ui.unsaved_desc: Changes will apply after a server restart.
ui.save_success: Properties saved successfully! Restart server to apply.

backups.title: Backups
backups.subtitle: Manage snapshots and configure auto-backups.
backups.empty_desc: Create a backup manually or enable auto-backups.
backups.pending_desc: A backup restore is queued. The next time you click Start, the server will be wiped and restored from:

tooltips.must_stop: Server must be STOPPED to queue a restore.

alerts.started: Backup started! It will appear in the list shortly.
alerts.queued: Restore Queued! The backup will be applied automatically when you next START the server.
alerts.stop_required: Server must be FULLY STOPPED to queue a restore.
alerts.confirm_restore:
WARNING: This will queue a restore.

The NEXT time you click 'Start', your current files will be DELETED and replaced with this backup.

Continue?

players.empty_list: No entries found for this list.

schedules.title: Automation
schedules.subtitle: Schedule restarts, commands, and power actions.

list.empty_desc: Create a task to automate your server.

modpacks.url_hint: Must be a direct link to a zip file containing the server files.
modpacks.java_hint: This determines which Java Runtime Environment will be installed on the server.
modpacks.no_files: No server files found for this modpack.

impact.clean_install: Switching from {{old}} to {{new}} requires a clean install. ALL existing files will be deleted.
impact.modpack_install: Installing a new Modpack requires a complete server reinstall. ALL existing files (world, configs) will be deleted.
impact.modpack_update: Updating {{pack}}. Your world and server.properties will be preserved, but mods, configs, and scripts will be reset.
impact.version_change: Changing version from {{old}} to {{new}}. Existing files are preserved, but downgrading may corrupt your world.
impact.backup_download: Download your world files before proceeding!
impact.backup_recommend: We recommend backing up your world before changing versions.

errors.invalid_url: Please enter a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL for the zip file.
errors.no_download: This file does not have a download URL.

messages.saved_reinstall: Configuration saved. Server will be completely re-installed on next restart.

world.warning_running_desc: You must stop the server to upload, download, or regenerate the world to prevent data corruption.

download.title: Download World
download.desc: Backup your current world as a .zip file

upload.title: Upload World
upload.desc: Restore a world from a .zip backup

generate.title: Generate New
generate.desc: Create a fresh world with custom seeds
generate.warning_delete: Warning: This will permanently delete the current world folder.

level_config.title: Level Config
level_config.desc: Edit level.dat, seeds, and game rules

errors.server_must_stop: Server must be stopped to perform this action.
errors.load_level_fail: Could not find world/level.dat. Has the world been generated?
